161  int setattr(uint32_t freq,
162  uint8_t clksrc = TMR_CLKSRC_CPU,
163  uint8_t pin_assign = 0,
164  uint8_t enabled_oc_chans = 0,

168  attr.freq = freq;
169  attr.pin_assign = pin_assign;
170  attr.enabled_ic_chans = enabled_ic_chans;
171  attr.enabled_oc_chans = enabled_oc_chans;
172  return setattr(&attr);
173  }

179  enum {
180  CPU = TMR_CLKSRC_CPU,
181  INPUT0 = TMR_CLKSRC_IC0,
182  INPUT1 = TMR_CLKSRC_IC1,
183  INPUT2 = TMR_CLKSRC_IC2,
184  INPUT3 = TMR_CLKSRC_IC3,
185  RISING = TMR_CLKSRC_EDGERISING,
186  FALLING = TMR_CLKSRC_EDGEFALLING,
187  BOTH = TMR_CLKSRC_EDGEBOTH,

189  };
190 
195  int init(uint32_t freq = 1000000,
196  uint8_t clksrc = TMR_CLKSRC_CPU,
197  uint8_t pin_assign = 0,
198  uint8_t enabled_oc_chans = 0,
199  uint8_t enabled_ic_chans = 0){
200  if( open() < 0 ){
201  return -1;
202  }
203  return setattr(freq, clksrc, pin_assign, enabled_oc_chans, enabled_ic_chans);
204  }
